english.segment1: Slowly drawn moths to the flame. We think we're strong we think we're anchored down. Then it comes, the hurricane. Down come the walls up come the foundations. we've been building on. and suddenly.. we'll see that
english.segment2: All that's left is to love. That's a;; that we have. That's all that we ever really had and. All that's left is to love. That's all that we have. That's al that we'll ever have
english.segment3: So let us look into each other's eyes. And read the stories written there between the lines. And take the list of all the wrongs we keep. And tear it into pieces. let mercy be the only thing we're harboring
english.segment4: Cause eventually.. we're gonna see that
english.segment5: All that's left is to love. That's a;; that we have. That's all that we ever really had and. All that's left is to love. That's all that we have. That's al that we'll ever have
english.segment6: This is why our heartsare beating. To love each other as we have been loved. Everything else is a fleeting shadow. But love endured all things. believes all things and hopes all things. And love never ends. Love never ends
english.segment7: All that's left is to love. That's a;; that we have. That's all that we ever really had and. All that's left is to love. That's all that we have. That's al that we'll ever have
english.segment8: All we ever really have. All we have in the end is love
english.segment9: Oh, the only thing that matters is to love. This is the only lasting treasure
english.segment10: Love endures all things and believes all things and hopes all things
